title: Windows Xp Professional sp3
description:
The torrent contains:
-x86-bit Windows Xp image system in (.wim)
-Windows PE .iso
----------

Windows xp profissional sp3 with:

-latest microsoft windows updates (April 8)
-32 MUI laguages pack beside English Lang
-Microsoft Plus! SuperPack
-MicrosoftPlus!DigitalMediaEdition
-.NET Framework (1.1sp1, 3.5, and 4) with all updates -important and optional- until (April 8)
-Microsoft powertoys for xp
-Internet Explorer 8 with all updates -important and optional- until (April 8)
-Windows media player 11 with all updates -important and optional- until (April 8)
and others

You can apply (.wim) file on:

-Just BIOS/MBR-Based Hard Drive Partitions
-Any virtual machines (VMWare, hyper-v, ...)

Note: There is no need to download the windowspe iso if:
      -you want to apply the wim image alongside windows 8 or windows 8.1 (BIOS/MBR-Based Hard Drive Partitions)
      -you had a windows 8 or 8.1 iso
      -you want to apply the wim image alongside windows 7 or vista which is already recognized (Imagex.exe) command

Applying the image:
-Alongside windows 8, 8.1 use (DISM.exe) in Command Prompt
Dism /Apply-Image /ImageFile:{FULL PATH OF WIM IMAGE} /Index:1 /ApplyDir:{PARTITION YOU WANT TO APPLY THE IMAGE ON}:
Ex:
Dism /Apply-Image /ImageFile:X:x86_v51_Build2600_xpsp_sp3_qfe_130704_0421.wim /Index:1 /ApplyDir:Z:


-Alongside windows 7, vista (which is already recognized (Imagex.exe) command) use (IMAGE.exe) in Command Prompt
Imagex /Apply {FULL PATH OF WIM IMAGE} 1 {PARTITION YOU WANT TO APPLY THE IMAGE ON}:
Ex:
Imagex /Apply X:x86_v51_Build2600_xpsp_sp3_qfe_130704_0421.wim 1 Z:

-Then use EasyBCD program to add xp in windows 8.1, 8, 7, or vista bootloader

On virual machines:
-Put the wim image in a new folder and zip the floder in .iso type or put it on usb drive
-create windows xp profissional virtual machine and specify hard disk size  
-use windows 8, 8.1 or WinPE .iso to partition and format the virtual Hard Disk
-using win 8, 8.1 iso go to Repair your computer - Troubleshoot - Command Prompt ; using WinPE .iso just type:

deskpart
list disk
select disk 0  (0 is the virtual hard disk)
clean
create partition primary
format quick fs=ntfs
assign letter="C"
active
-plug in usb drive to virtual machine
list vol
exit
-then use (DISM.exe) command
Dism /Apply-Image /ImageFile:X:x86_v51_Build2600_xpsp_sp3_qfe_130704_0421.wim /Index:1 /ApplyDir:C:
